*   [Bk](https://www1.nyc.gov/events/danceafrica/367034/3) #### [DanceAfrica](https://www1.nyc.gov/events/danceafrica/367034/3)

May 25, All Day Event Peter Jay Sharp Building, BAM Howard Gilman Opera House,  Check website for details

DanceAfrica celebrates its bright future and its deep roots.

BAM’s corner of Fort Greene transforms into a pulsing celebration of community, discovery, and collective joy at this beloved annual festival. Show Details  [Visit the website](https://www.bam.org/danceafrica25) ![Image 7](https://www.nyc.gov/assets/home/images/modules/events-filter/slider-close.png) [](https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https://www1.nyc.gov/events/danceafrica/367034/3)[](https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=DanceAfrica%20https://www1.nyc.gov/events/danceafrica/367034/3%20via%20@nycgov)[](https://plus.google.com/share?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww1.nyc.gov%2Fevents%2Fdanceafrica%2F367034%2F3)[](http://www.tumblr.com/share/link?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww1.nyc.gov%2Fevents%2Fdanceafrica%2F367034%2F3&name=DanceAfrica&description=via%20NYC.gov)[](mailto:?subject=All%20Events%20%7C%20City%20of%20New%20York&body=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nyc.gov%2Fevents%2Fevents-filter.html)Share    [go](https://www1.nyc.gov/events/danceafrica/367034/3)    
*   [NYC](https://www1.nyc.gov/events/fleet-week/367035/5) #### [Fleet Week](https://www1.nyc.gov/events/fleet-week/367035/5)

May 25, All Day Event Various venues,  A week-long celebration of sea services, May 21 - May 27

Fleet Week New York, May 21 - May 27, is the city’s time-honored celebration of the sea services. It is an unparalleled opportunity for the citizens of New York and the surrounding tri-state area to meet Sailors, Marines and Coast Guardsmen, as well as witness firsthand the latest capabilities of today’s maritime services. The weeklong celebration has been held nearly every year since 1984. Show Details   ![Image 8](https://www.nyc.gov/assets/home/images/modules/events-filter/slider-close.png) [](https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https://www1.nyc.gov/events/fleet-week/367035/5)[](https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Fleet%20Week%20https://www1.nyc.gov/events/fleet-week/367035/5%20via%20@nycgov)[](https://plus.google.com/share?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww1.nyc.gov%2Fevents%2Ffleet-week%2F367035%2F5)[](http://www.tumblr.com/share/link?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww1.nyc.gov%2Fevents%2Ffleet-week%2F367035%2F5&name=Fleet%20Week&description=via%20NYC.gov)[](mailto:?subject=All%20Events%20%7C%20City%20of%20New%20York&body=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nyc.gov%2Fevents%2Fevents-filter.html)Share    [go](https://www1.nyc.gov/events/fleet-week/367035/5)    
*   [NYC](https://www1.nyc.gov/events/bike-month/523296/25) #### [Bike Month](https://www1.nyc.gov/events/bike-month/523296/25)

May 25, All Day Event Multiple locations citywide,  Free helmets, gear, educational opportunities, and more available throughout the month.

May is Bike Month! To celebrate, NYC DOT announced free events designed to encourage cycling, promote safety, and celebrate the city's growing bike culture. NYC DOT will host events in May across all five boroughs, including: free bicycle helmet fittings, bike light giveaways, educational outreach for delivery workers, and a variety of bicycle-focused programming.

Visit [nyc.gov/BikeEvents](https://www.nyc.gov/BikeEvents) for a full list of events and locations. Show Details  [Visit the website](https://www.nyc.gov/html/dot/html/bicyclists/bike-events.shtml) ![Image 9](https://www.nyc.gov/assets/home/images/modules/events-filter/slider-close.png) [](https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https://www1.nyc.gov/events/bike-month/523296/25)[](https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Bike%20Month%20https://www1.nyc.gov/events/bike-month/523296/25%20via%20@nycgov)[](https://plus.google.com/share?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww1.nyc.gov%2Fevents%2Fbike-month%2F523296%2F25)[](http://www.tumblr.com/share/link?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww1.nyc.gov%2Fevents%2Fbike-month%2F523296%2F25&name=Bike%20Month&description=via%20NYC.gov)[](mailto:?subject=All%20Events%20%7C%20City%20of%20New%20York&body=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nyc.gov%2Fevents%2Fevents-filter.html)Share    [go](https://www1.nyc.gov/events/bike-month/523296/25)

#### [Memorial Day](https://www1.nyc.gov/events/memorial-day/10730/1)

May 26, All Day Event NYC Public Schools,  

Federal Holiday, State Holiday, City Holiday; Post offices and other government buildings are closed. New York City public schools are closed.

**Federal Holiday****State Holiday**

**City Holiday**

    *   Post offices and other government buildings are closed. There is no mail delivery.
    *   City offices are closed.
    *   New York City public schools are closed.

Show Details

[Visit the website](https://www.schools.nyc.gov/calendar/2024-2025-school-year-calendar)NYC Department of Education[311](tel:+311)
